channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: The FBI has continued to mishandle allegations of child sexu
item.description: The FBI has continued to mishandle allegations of child sexual abuse in the years after the bureau’s notorious bungling of the investigation into disgraced USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar, according to an audit by the Justice Department’s inspector general released today.

item.title: An Oregon National Guard helicopter crew rescued a climber i
item.description: An Oregon National Guard helicopter crew rescued a climber injured by a falling rock near Ochoco Reservoir last night after search and rescue teams from Crook and Deschutes counties were unable to remove her from a narrow ledge 30 feet above the valley floor.

item.title: The heat up begins! Sunny skies today with highs in the 80s,
item.description: The heat up begins! Sunny skies today with highs in the 80s, some areas tipping into the 90s. We will continue to heat up into the weekend, with some possibly record breaking heat on Saturday. #ktvzweather
